assetProfile.address2: Khaled Bin Al Waleed Street Behind Alraya Complex, Sharq PO Box 29050, Safat
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Al Imtiaz Investment Group Company - K.S.C. (Public), an investment holding company, manages a portfolio of investments across various sectors in Kuwait and internationally. The company operates through Financial Services (Real Estate), Pharmaceuticals, Education, Food and Beverage, IT Solutions and Fintech, and Oil and Construction segments. It invests in real estate, industrial, agriculture, and other sectors; invests in and manages public and private institution's funds; and prepares technical, economic, valuation, and feasibility studies, as well as provides consultancy services. The company also operates as a mediator in lending and borrowing operations; issues bonds; offers custodian services; and provides international trade financing and brokering services. In addition, it offers loans; deals and trades in foreign exchange and precious metals market; trades in securities; mobilizes resources; and arranges Ijara financing for small and medium enterprises. Further, the company owns and rents industrial property rights, patents, commercial and industrial trademarks, business graphics, intellectual property rights, and related intellectual programs and literature; and establishes and manages investment funds. Additionally, it engages in the provision of educational services; and IT, cloud computing, cyber security, and enterprise software solutions to public and private sector companies. The company also offers grinding and packaging of spices, grains, and herbs; provides support services for oil and gas drilling operations; owns and manages Al Dhow Tower; and produces branded generic pharmaceuticals. The company was formerly known as Al Imtiaz Investment Company - K.S.C. (Public). Al Imtiaz Investment Group Company - K.S.C. (Public) was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
